items.sentence: I'll never find a keyboard patch that actually sounds like an electric guitar.
I wanted to be a singer, but I was told that I should learn to play the drums.
It may never be known how we silly Anglophones got "baloney" out of "bologna."
Tom got out in front of the library and waited while Mary went to park the car.
Tom discovered that life on the road wasn\'t as easy as he thought it would be.
Tom isn\'t alone in thinking that Mary is the most beautiful girl in his class.
I imagine that Tom will eventually learn to deal with the way people treat him.
I can\'t figure out how to transfer MP3 files from my iPod back to my computer.
I wonder whether or not Tom has already told Mary she doesn\'t have to do that.
